apihelp-query+wigo-param-month: Only count votes from this month
apihelp-query+wigo-param-year: Only count votes from this year
apihelp-query+wigo-param-prefix: Return entries whose ids begin with this value
apihelp-query+wigo-param-limit: How many total entries to return
apihelp-query+wigovotes-param-month: Only count votes from this month
apihelp-query+wigovotes-param-year: Only count votes from this year
apihelp-query+wigovotes-param-prefix: Return entries whose ids begin with this value. Overrides $1id
apihelp-query+wigovotes-param-start: The start timestamp to return from
apihelp-query+wigovotes-param-end: The end timestamp to return to
apihelp-query+wigovotes-param-continue: When more results are available, use this to continue
apihelp-query+wigovotes-param-limit: How many total entries to return
apihelp-query+wigovotes-param-dir: The direction to search (older or newer)
apihelp-query+wigovotes-param-min: Only return votes greater or equal to this
apihelp-query+wigovotes-param-max: Only return votes lower or equal to this
apihelp-wigo-cast-vote-param-countoption: The total amount of options in the poll
apihelp-wigo-cast-vote-example-1: Vote for the 2nd option on the poll that has the ID Birds
apihelp-wigo-get-my-vote-summary: Get my vote for a given poll
apihelp-wigo-get-my-vote-example-1: Get my vote for the poll that has the ID Birds
